roleset.name: portray falsely

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: The settlement stems from charges that Better Book , now defunct , made misrepresentations in selling advertising for the directories and memberships in the bureau from 1984 to 1986 .
example.arg: in selling advertising for the directories and memberships in the bureau from 1984 to 1986 .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: His misrepresentation of himself as a member of The Florida Bar Association in good standing landed him in prison.
example.arg: as a member of the Florida Bar Association in good standing

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry misrepresent.01. No corresponding VN class.
